basics.name: Nouran Soliman
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am studying a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the Arab Academy for Science and Technology, Alexandria, Egypt. I am interested in research and I am looking forward to doing my graduate studies in Computer Science. I am a research intern at Adobe Creative Intelligence Lab , SF, USA. And I am an Adobe Women In Tech Scholarship Winner. I have scratched the surface of wireless applications, HCI, computer vision, computer graphics and machine learning. I am currently interested to explore more in those fields and I am also very open to learning more about other fields. I am looking for undergraduate research internships for spring and summer. My CV with more details about my projects, awards and services can be found here . Not to forget my transcript . More details about some of my selected projects can be found on the projects page below.
